title: An Indian politician is using deepfake technology to win new voters
selftext: Deepfake is already in India and we are just hearing about it!
comments:
Oh my friend, you are really underestimating what the Modi regime is capable of:

This is what happened to Olympic medal winners in the country when they protested against sexual molestation issue (by one of the top leaders in Modi's party):
> [HackerNews forum: India ruling party's IT cell used AI to show smile on arrested protesters' faces (altnews.in) ](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36113551)
